summary: Makes the Necromancer\'s Amulet an artifact worthy of the legend of the Worm King Mannimarco.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=red]Announcement!: Version 1.5b is now live![/color][/center]

[center]This mod changes the Necromancer\'s Amulet to make it into an artifact more worthy of its description in lore.[/center]

[center][color=Aqua][b]-----Bonuses-----[/center][/color][/b][center]
[color=Burlywood]
Increases Armor by 400
[/color]
[color=Dodgerblue]
+20% Spell Absorption

+25% base Magicka

+75% Magicka Regeneration or +100% if you have no other Magicka Regeneration increasing effects

The magnitude of Destruction and duration of Illusion spells are increased by 20%
The cost of Destruction and Illusion spells are reduced by 10%

Conjuration spells last +50% longer

Conjuration spells cost 25% less
[/color]
[color=Olivedrab]
+50% resistance to Poison
[/color]
[color=Magenta]
all Reanimation spells are boosted in magnitude so they will work on any level target.
[/color]
[color=Khaki]
Necromancers, Draugr and Skeletons are your allies. 
Spiders and Skeevers become friends. 
Dragon Priests become neutral (some may still attack you!)
[/color]

[color=Aqua][u]It also gives the wearer four spells while it is equipped:[/color][/u]

[color=Magenta][b][u][Animate Thrall][/b][/u]
Conjuration spell.
will reanimate a single target that is not a Daedra or Machine permanently.
(up to the max commanded actor limit, i.e. 2 if you have twin souls or more if you have mods that increase the summon limit)
[/color]

[color=Magenta][b][u][Ritual of Animation][/b][/u]
Conjuration spell.
will permanently reanimate all non-Daedra and non-Machine targets around the caster.
(up to the max commanded actor limit, i.e. 2 if you have twin souls or more if you have mods that increase the summon limit)
[/color]

[color=OrangeRed][b][u][Harvest Soul][/b][/u]
Destruction spell.
Costs 20% of the caster\'s health in addition to the Magicka cost unless the target entirely resists the spell.
if the caster has at least 4x the target\'s current Magicka the target will be killed instantly.
if the target is an NPC their soul will be trapped.
if the caster does not have at least 4x the target\'s current Magicka, or if the target is essential, the spell does 40% of the caster\'s health in damage instead.
[b][u]Dragons, Daedra, Dwemer Machines and Dragon Priests will resist this spell entirely![/u][/b]
[/color]

[color=OrangeRed][b][u][Siphon Power][/b][/u]
Destruction school Power.
consumes 50% of the caster\'s current Stamina and steals twice as much Magicka from the target.
[/color]

[/center]


[center][color=Crimson][b]-----Costs-----[/center][/color][/b][center][color=Crimson]
Drains your Speech to 0.

Drains maximum Health and Stamina by 50% each.

Eliminates Health and Stamina Regeneration.

Increases cost of Restoration spells by 100%.

Reduces effectiveness of Block, Archery, One-handed and Two-handed by 80% while also draining those skills to 0.

Makes you an enemy of the Vigilants of Stendarr.

You take 10 points of damage per second while under heavy light during the daytime and outside.
[/color]
[/center]




[center][color=Lightcoral][b][u]----------Changes----------[/center][/color][/b][/u]
[center]
[color=Aqua][b][u]General Changes[/color][/b][/u]

[color=Crimson]10 sun damage per second while outside during the day when in the light[/color]

[color=Olivedrab]+50% resistance to Poison[i](was 100% to Poison and Disease)[/i][/color]

[color=Dodgerblue]- The magnitude of Destruction and duration of Illusion spells are increased by 20% . The cost of Destruction and Illusion spells are reduced by 10%.[/color]

[color=Dodgerblue]- Increases total Magicka by 25% of base [i](was flat 200)[/i][/color]

[color=Dodgerblue]- Increases Magicka Regeneration by 100%[i](was 300%)[/i] if no other Magicka Regeneration effects are present[/color]

[color=Crimson]- The Block, Archery, One-handed and Two-handed skills are reduced to zero. The effectiveness of Blocking and the damage of Archery, One-handed and Two-handed are also reduced by an additional 80% while wearing the amulet.[/color]

[color=Crimson]- Restoration spells cost 100% more.[/color]

[color=Crimson]- maximum Health and Stamina are reduced by 50%[i](was base reduced by 25%)[/i][/color]

[color=Aqua][b][u]Spell Changes:[/color][/b][/u]
[color=Orangered][b][u][Harvest Soul][/b][/u]
now requires the caster to have 4x the total current Magicka of the target in order to instantly kill the target.
now deals 40% of the caster\'s health in damage to the target instead of a flat 100 damage.
now also costs 20% of the caster\'s maximum Health in addition to Magicka cost. This additional cost applies as long as the target does not entirely resist the spell.
[/color]

[color=Orangered][b][u][Siphon Power][/b][/u]
Is now a Power.
[/color]
[/center]



[center][b][u]----------Requirements----------[/center][/b][/u]
The only requirement is an up-to-date Skyrim. Nothing else is needed!



[center][b][u]----------Incompatibilities----------[/center][/b][/u]
This mod will obviously be incompatible with any other mod that makes changes to anything other the Amulet\'s textures or meshes without altering the rest of the item data.
This mod will also be incompatible with mods that make interfaction relation changes to the DraugrFaction, NecromancerFaction, SkeeverFaction, SkeletonFaction, SpiderFaction, and VigilantOfStendarrFaction and should be loaded after any mods that make such changes to prevent issues.




[center][b][u]----------Installation----------[/center][/b][/u]
Simple as 1,2,3!
Just drop both the ESP and bsa file into your Skyrim/Data folder.



[center][b][u]----------Uninstallation----------[/center][/b][/u]
1) load your game and make sure you don\'t have the amulet currently equipped. 
2) make a new save.
3) delete the ESP and bsa files from your Skyrim/Data folder.
4) load the save from step 2 and ignore the warning.
5) now make a new save.
6) done!
